title: At Christmas markets, you can drink bacon
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary: Christmas markets opened last Friday, attracting both tourists and locals. Even though Christmas seems to come earlier every year, the markets are something to look forward to. “My main experience of Christmas markets in Slovakia is fat dripping onto my toes,” says James Thomson, who walks you through the markets and the Slovak specialties that you need to taste when you visit.
itunes:subtitle: Christmas markets opened last Friday, attracting …
description: Christmas markets opened last Friday, attracting both tourists and locals. Even though Christmas seems to come earlier every year, the markets are something to look forward to. “My main experience of Christmas markets in Slovakia is fat dripping onto my toes,” says James Thomson, who walks you through the markets and the Slovak specialties that you need to taste when you visit.
